response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and utility, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000, making it an excellent opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
